name: Senja
author: senjahq

sections.description:
Embed and display testimonials from Senja with ease using this WordPress Plugin.

This WordPress plugin allows you to select and display testimonials from Senja using:
– Blocks
– Shortcode
– Elementor Page Builder

Senja is a service that allows you to easily collect text and video testimonials. It loads a small script in the editor for choosing testimonials.

On front, it loads the Senja script on pages where such testimonial widgets are shown.

Senja website: https://senja.io/
Senja Privacy Policy: https://senja.io/legal/privacy-policy
Senja Terms & Conditions: https://senja.io/legal/terms-of-service
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
How much does Senja cost

Senja is completely free to use.

Can I use my Google reviews?

You can import testimonials from Google as well as over 20 different social media sites and review platforms.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Update widgets to use faster embed code

1.0.0

  • Release
